General.Name: JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited
General.Description: JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited operates food and beverage outlets in Thailand. It operates Suki Shabu restaurant under the HOTPOT BUFFET brand name; Shabu and grill buffet under the Hot Pot Gold name; a la carte that offer Suki Shabu buffet under the Hot Pot Inter Buffet name; Korean style grilled buffet under the Daidomon Korea Grill brand name; Japanese style shabu food under the Shabu Tomo brand; Chinese, seafood, and Chinese, dim sum, and seafood restaurant under the Zheng Dou Grand; and British restaurant under the Burger & Lobster brand. The company was formerly known as Hot Pot Public Company Limited and changed its name to JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited in March 2018. JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
